power.reincarnation-origins.dragonkin/bl: Absorb magic from water sources. When full, gain the powers of your Blue Dragon ancestors
power.reincarnation-origins.dragonkin/br: Absorb magic from stone. When full, gain the powers of your Brown Dragon ancestors
power.reincarnation-origins.dragonkin/lo: You have small wings, you can only fly for a short time before needing a break.
power.reincarnation-origins.dragonkin/re: Absorb magic from fire, lava, and hot blocks. When full, gain the powers of your Red Dragon ancestors
power.reincarnation-origins.dragonkin/wh: Absorb magic from the open sky. When full, gain the powers of your White Dragon ancestors
power.reincarnation-origins.dragon-suppo: If you run out of Elemental Magic you will revert to Dragonkin form and not be able to return to this form for some time.
power.reincarnation-origins.blue-dragon/: Refill your magic stores in water, consumed from casting abilities.
Use some of your water stores to heal nearby creatures.
Sources of heat quickly drain your Magic stores.
Being out of water drains your Magic, faster in the sun.
Propel yourself with a grand display. Temporarily increases your swim speed.
Your wings are better suited to swimming, you can't fly for very long.
You quickly slide around on land.
You can swim much faster than most other creatures.
While you *can* fly with these, they're much more helpful for swimming.
power.reincarnation-origins.brown-dragon: Use some of your Magic to boost yourself and temporarily move through an expanded variety of blocks. Only available while Wurm Tunneling.
Refill your Rock (and Stone!) magic when in caves and around rocks.
Channel your magic into the ground, sending out a shockwave that damages and stuns nearby enemies, encasing them in stone for a short time.
Activate to sense nearby blocks you cannot move through.
Your wings are better suited to burrowing than flight. You can fly only for a short time.
Your eyes are accustomed to the darkness of the earth.
Being under the open sky drains your magic.
Toggle to tunnel through solid rock. Use your Sonar to see nearby obstacles.
You can only fly for a short amount of time.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/a: Lose Magic when not near hot things.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/b: Release a burst of fire for additional jumps!
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/f: Breath a stream of fire in front of you. Can be used to light furnaces!
Refill your magic stores near (or in) hot stuff.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/h: Lose Magic rapidly when touching water.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/i: Shift and right-click to consume coal, charcoal, block of coal, or lava buckets in your offhand, refilling your fuel over time.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/l: You have strong wings which allow you to fly for longer.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/m: You are perfectly at home in the molten depths of the earth.
power.reincarnation-origins.red-dragon/w: If your head goes under water you start taking damage.
power.reincarnation-origins.white-dragon: Propel yourself forward with a burst of air.
[Shift + Activate] to shoot a cyclone forward that sucks in nearby entities. Activate to ride a ball of air around!
You can't swim, you just float.
Refill your magic stores while under the open sky.
You're at home in the sky, fly for extended periods.
reincarnation-origins.white-dragon.error: You are not under the sky.
reincarnation-origins.dragonkin.error.to: You are too tired to fly! Sneak to fall faster.
reincarnation-origins.dragonkin.error.wa: You've completely diminished your Water Magic stores! You cannot accumulate Water Magic for some time.
reincarnation-origins.dragonkin.error.st: You've completely diminished your Stone Magic stores! You cannot accumulate Stone Magic for some time.
reincarnation-origins.dragonkin.error.fi: You've completely diminished your Fire Magic stores! You cannot accumulate Fire Magic for some time.
reincarnation-origins.dragonkin.error.ai: You've completely diminished your Air Magic stores! You cannot accumulate Air Magic for some time.
